tags.label: Tags
tags.errorLoading: Error loading tags. Please try again.
tags.description: Type to search for tags. Use arrow keys to navigate suggestions, Enter to select, Escape to close.

category.label: Category
category.errorLoading: Error loading categories. Please try again.
category.description: Select a category to filter videos. Use arrow keys to navigate options, Enter or Space to select, Escape to close.

topics.label: Topics
topics.errorLoading: Error loading topics. Please try again.
topics.description: Type to search for topics. Topics are organized hierarchically. Use arrow keys to navigate, Enter to select, Escape to close. Type any letter to jump to topics starting with that letter.

activeFilters.title: Active Filters
activeFilters.noActiveFilters: No active filters. Select tags, categories, or topics to filter videos.

warnings.maxTotalReached: Maximum filter limit reached ({max}). Remove filters to add more.
warnings.maxTagsReached: Maximum tag limit reached ({max}). Remove tags to add more.
warnings.maxTopicsReached: Maximum topic limit reached ({max}). Remove topics to add more.
